name: Sudokuu
description:
This game was my first-ever game jam! It was completed, from start to finish, in just one week. 

SudoKuu is a chance & time based, sequence matching, hyper-casual memory game. The game uses Unreal Engine 4.25.3, based on no levels (meaning: pure widget/user interface game), with Blueprint coding only.

The goal is to memorize the sequence in order, and to relay it under the random timer that the Devil has set up for you! But be aware that it won't be such an easy thing to do, as pesky-little monsters will try to ruin your day! Mwahahaha .  .  .
